extendedInfo.description: Looking for what to watch, rent, read, play or buy for your kids? Get instant access to over 18,000 trustworthy ratings and reviews from Common Sense Media, a not-for-profit organization dedicated to helping you make the best media decisions for your kids. Our extensive database of movie, DVD, TV show, book, music, app, and game reviews are now at your fingertips. Key features: â¢ Discover current and classic movies, books, TV shows, apps, and games that are right for your kidsâ¢ Search over 18,000 helpful reviews and create personalized profiles based on your kids' ages â¢ Check out age ratings and important content details like violence, sex, language, and positive role modelsâ¢ Browse Top Picks from our editors for kids of every age and stageâ¢ Watch video reviews of top movie releases â¢ Save reviews as favorites or share with friends on Facebook or Twitter â¢ Available for online or offline browsingâ¢ Check reviews before purchasing or watching with voice-activated search and barcode scanBrought to you by Common Sense Media, an independent not-for-profit organization committed to helping families manage media and technology in life and learning.This is our first release of Kids Media! Please help us make it better by reporting issues to us at android app@commonsense.org.Note: The first time you open the Kids Media app, it might take a few minutes to download our database of reviews and ratings. After the initial download you will be able to view our content even if you're offline.

reviews.title: No changelog?
reviews.comment: It just updated. What\'s new?
reviews.author: Ryan Finley

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Thank you.
reviews.author: Chris Heaton

reviews.title: Love the website!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using the website for years and have been waiting for an app so I can easily check media content when I\'m away from home. I was so excited to see this app now, I don\'t know what rating to give it, since I haven\'t used it yet.
reviews.author: Sheiyne Rosencrance

reviews.title: Very interesting
reviews.comment: For me this is a good app for me  because I\'m also a kid.. Love it....
reviews.author: Sophia Ponciano

reviews.comment: Very helpful tool for anyone with kids.
reviews.author: Karla Earley

reviews.comment: Nicely done
reviews.author: Abhinandan B R

reviews.comment: Never leave home without it!
reviews.author: Arlene Eggleton

reviews.title: Good guide with no over the top judgements
reviews.comment: I have visited the Common Sense Media sight so much I have cime to trust it\'s judgment. The simple statement of \"know your child\" resonates the straightforward & realistic position it takea on all that the sight reviews.
reviews.author: Adam Niemeyer

reviews.title: WHAT????
reviews.comment: whats wrong with you people in giving 5 stars??? Their website is truly wonderful... BUT A FAMILY TO FAMILY REVIEW APP WITH NO WAY OF READING OTHER FAMILIES REVIEWS???? AND NO WAY TO WRITE YOUR OWN REVIEWS??? In what world does that make any sence??? Just stick with their website where there is actually some usefulness. Do you guys even think for yourselves? R U HAPPY BEING SPOONFED WITHOUT ANY OF YOUR INPUT? WHAT A BUNCH OF SHEEP. DEMAND MORE RIGHTS AND FREEDOM LIKE WHAT YOU GET FROM THEIR WEBSITE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What\'s new
reviews.comment: Not good to update an app and not specify what has changed
reviews.author: Kayode Olorunfemi

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: What a wonderful application to help parents make wise informed decisions about what their children watch.
reviews.author: Bronwen Weston-Green

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: The best app for movies. .needs better search. For queries.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Decent
reviews.author: Michael Nicell

reviews.title: Essential app.
reviews.comment: I constantly check the reviews and ratings from Common Sense Media. Having this app will make checking much easier. I\'ve just installed it, but the recommendation feature looks helpful.
reviews.author: David Resnick

reviews.title: Finally!!!
reviews.comment: I have been waiting for this App for over a year now!  Thank you CSM for delivering!  It\'s awesome!  I love the way I can configure it for my children, and then browse media suggestions for each of them, or both of them in a combined list!  Very cool.    When we go to the local video store (or video vending machine), my kids always ask \"How about this one Dad?\", now I can quickly find them on my phone via the app.  Thanks for helping to make our video rental process safer and easier!
reviews.author: Jay Kappel

reviews.comment: Excellent for deciding whether the content of a film is suitable . Recommended.\tIf you want to know what content is in a film, this app is perfect.
reviews.author: Astrid Rathbone

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: So far so good. Very good app..
reviews.author: Mina Coursey

reviews.title: In Love With It
reviews.comment: Whenever The Family is about to watch a movie .. this is the first place I check b4 watching it .. I feel safe with this app .
reviews.author: Taiba Al Ebrahim

reviews.comment: Krah
reviews.author: kra ju

reviews.title: 18,000 reviews in your pocket
reviews.comment: Makes it so easy to find the best stuff for my kids.  Love the save to favorites feature.
reviews.author: Amy Wilson
